Episodes.Title: Pilot
Episodes.Plot: Harvey throws Mike his first case, a ''pro bono'' sexual harassment suit involving a CEO. But will Mike's need to raise twenty-five thousand dollars and his ''bad influence'' best friend get in his way? If Harvey is going to stay on top of his game, he'll have to keep Mike motivated and honest.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Errors and Omissions
Episodes.Plot: Mike has an ethical dilemma when Louis forces him to make a decision that could hurt his relationship with Harvey. Elsewhere, Harvey's past comes back to haunt him during a case.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Inside Track
Episodes.Plot: Jessica hopes Harvey's promotion will reign him in, but when a crisis arises with the first client he brought into the firm, Harvey goes rogue trying to fix it.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Titus Welliver, Tom Lipinski, Vanessa Ray, Rebecca Schull, Hamish McEwan, Matt Cooke, Julian DeZotti

Episodes.Title: Dirty Little Secrets
Episodes.Plot: Harvey and Jessica's relationship is tested when Harvey defends someone from her past. Also, Louis assigns Mike his first solo case, a pro bono that has him itching for a win.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Russell Hornsby, Sharon Leal, Anthony Starke, Matthew Lemche, Paulino Nunes, Donald Burda, Christina Chang

Episodes.Title: Bail Out
Episodes.Plot: Mike's life becomes complicated when an old friend reappears and needs his help. Harvey must decide between closing a multi-million dollar deal and helping his trusted driver defend himself against a law suit.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Tom Lipinski, Harvey Atkin, Jose Zuniga, Susan Saint James, Ivan Martin, Anand Rajaram, Julian DeZotti

Episodes.Title: Tricks of the Trade
Episodes.Plot: Harvey and Mike work to save a woman wrongly accused of insider trading. Mike helps Rachel study for the LSAT, only to find out she is on the brink of discovering his closely guarded secret.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Tracie Thoms, Jenny Mollen, JR Bourne, Avery Pearson, Peter MacNeill, Doug Murray, Jeananne Goossen, Paul Essiembre

Episodes.Title: Play the Man
Episodes.Plot: It's mock trial time at Pearson Hardman as Mike faces off against Louis' protege Devon. But the tension between Mike and Rachel threatens to torpedo his case. Abigail Spencer guest stars.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Abigail Spencer, Vanessa Ray, Hal Ozsan, Ben Hollingsworth

Episodes.Title: Identity Crisis
Episodes.Plot: Mike is tasked with reigning in a modern day Robin Hood whose illicit deeds are putting a client's business at risk. Also, Louis must resolve his differences with Harvey to win a case. Amanda Crew and Bruce Altman guest star.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Paula Newsome, Amanda Crew, Tim Russ, Bruce Altman, James Morrison

Episodes.Title: Undefeated
Episodes.Plot: An undefeated lawyer's shady tactics keep him one step ahead of Harvey, who must decide if he's willing to compromise his ethics to win the case. Meanwhile, Mike must defend Rachel from accusations of treason. Eric Close, Vincent Laresca, Julie Ann Emery and Pooch Hall guest star.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Eric Close, Pooch Hall, Vincent Laresca, Julie Ann Emery, David Reale

Episodes.Title: Shelf Life
Episodes.Plot: Mike questions the firing of an executive, whom Harvey dismissed at the request of a client.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Drug references and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Andrea Parker, John Billingsley, Vanessa Ray, Patrick Gallagher, Ben Lewis

Episodes.Title: Rules of the Game
Episodes.Plot: Harvey's former mentor turns to him for help when his office comes under investigation. Meanwhile, Jenny suspects Mike may be occupied with more than just his job.
Episodes.GuestStars: Gary Cole, Alicia Coppola, Vanessa Ray, Ben Hollingsworth, Alex Paxton-Beesley, Megan Fahlenbock

Episodes.Title: Dog Fight
Episodes.Plot: Harvey's efforts to free an innocent man hit a wall when he goes against the new district attorney, who seems more focused on the integrity of the system than justice.
Episodes.GuestStars: Chi McBride, Vanessa Ray, Tom Lipinski, Neil Brown Jr.
